title: Process a Security Deposit Refund
description: A former tenant moved out, an inspection was completed with no damages found, and their security deposit is due to be refunded.

tasks.description: Verify the move-out inspection report shows no damages.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the report is clean.
Agent has the correct forwarding address for the former tenant.

tasks.description: Issue a check for the full security deposit amount and mail it to the tenant's forwarding address within the legally required timeframe.
tasks.expected_outcome: A check is cut from the trust account and mailed, and the action is logged in the system.
